description: This file defines a `BudgetService` class in Dart that manages interactions with a backend API for budget management functionalities. It includes methods to fetch budgets, fetch analytics, and create new budgets, handling HTTP requests, responses, and associated data processing.

classes.name: BudgetService
classes.description: Service class providing static methods to interact with the backend API for budget-related operations, including fetch, create, and analytics functionalities.

methods.name: fetchBudgets
methods.description: Fetches a list of budgets for the authenticated user from the backend.

methods.name: fetchAnalytics
methods.description: Retrieves spending analytics data such as category breakdowns.

methods.name: createBudget
methods.description: Creates a new budget entry based on provided data, handling category resolution and API communication.
